name: Ambush Drake
subtitle: Medium dragon, unaligned
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The drake has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the drake's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Surprise Attack
special_abilities.desc: If the drake surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Azbara is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Azbara has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
- Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp
- 1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
- 2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, misty step, scorching ray
- 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, fireball

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Azbara has two scrolls of mage armor.

special_abilities.name: Potent Cantrips
special_abilities.desc: When Azbara casts an evocation Cantrips and misses, or the target succeeds on its saving throw, the target still takes half the cantrip's damage but suffers no other effect.

special_abilities.name: Sculpt Spells
special_abilities.desc: When Azbara casts an evocation spell that affects other creatures that he can see, he can choose a number of them equal to 1+the spell's level to succeed on their saving throws against the spell. Those creatures take no damage if they would normally take half damage from the spell.

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Blagothkus is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Blagothkus has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
- Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, prestidigitation
- 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, magic missile, shield
- 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, misty step, shatter
- 3rd level (2 slots): fly, lightning bolt

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Blagothkus has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.description: Blagothkus attacks twice with his morningstar.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.
actions.name: Morningstar

special_abilities.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: On his turn, Othelstan can take one additional action.

special_abilities.name: Tiamat's Blessing of Retribution
special_abilities.desc: When Othelstan takes damage that reduces him to 0 hit points, he immediately regains 20 hit points. If he has 20 hit points or fewer at the end of his next turn, he dies.

actions.description: Othelstan attacks twice with his flail or spear, or makes two ranged attacks with his spears.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Flail

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Spear

special_abilities.name: Dragon Fanatic
special_abilities.desc: The dragonclaw has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonclaw can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Fanatic Advantage
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, if the dragonclaw makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The dragonclaw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonclaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.description: The dragonclaw attacks twice with its scimitar.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Scimitar

name: Dralmorrer Borngray
subtitle: Medium humanoid(high elf), neutral evil
languages: Common, Bullywug, Draconic, Elvish, Goblin, Sylvan

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Dralmorrer is a 7th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
- Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
- 1st level (4 slots): longstrider, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
- 2nd level (2 slots): magic weapon, misty step

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Dralmorrer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

special_abilities.name: War Magic
special_abilities.desc: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

special_abilities.name: Weapon Bond
special_abilities.desc: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.

actions.description: Dralmorrer attacks twice, either with his longsword or dagger.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Frulam is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Frulam has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:
- Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
- 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, sanctuary
- 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person, spiritual weapon
- 3rd level (2 slots): mass healing word, spirit guardians

actions.description: Frulam attacks twice with her halberd.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Halberd

name: Guard Drake
subtitle: Medium dragon, unaligned
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

actions.description: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Jamna is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Jamna has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list.
- Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost
- 1st level (3 slots): charm person, color spray, disguise self, longstrider

special_abilities.name: Cunning Action
special_abilities.desc: Jamna can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Gnome Cunning
special_abilities.desc: Jamna has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.description: Jamna attacks twice with her shortswords.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 9 (1d6 + 3) plus (1d6) piercing damage if the target is Medium or larger.
actions.name: Shortsword

special_abilities.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: On his turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

special_abilities.name: Improved Critical
special_abilities.desc: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

actions.description: Langdedrosa attacks twice, either with his greatsword or spear.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Spear

actions.description: Langdedrosa breathes lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:
- Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, poison spray
- 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, healing word, thunderwave
- 2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, beast sense, spike growth
- 3rd level (3 slots): plant growth, water walk

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Poison Strike (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.description: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit. reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Spear

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Rath is an 11th-level spellcaster who uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Rath has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
- Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
- 1st level (4 slots): chromatic orb, color spray, mage armor, magic missile
- 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, phantasmal force
- 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, major image
- 4th level (3 slots): confusion, greater invisibility
- 5th level (2 slots): mislead, seeming
- 6th level (1 slot): globe of invulnerability

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Rath has a staff of fire, and scrolls of dimension door, feather fall, and fireball.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Quarterstaff

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Rezmir has the Black Dragon Mask, Hazirawn, and an insignia of claws.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Rezmir can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Dark Advantage
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, Rezmir can deal an extra 10 (3d6) damage when she hits with a weapon attack, provided Rezmir has advantage on the attack roll.

special_abilities.name: Draconic Majesty
special_abilities.desc: While wearing no armor and wearing the Black Dragon Mask, Rezmir adds her Charisma bonus to her AC (included).

special_abilities.name: Immolation
special_abilities.desc: When Rezmir is reduced to 0 hit points, her body disintegrates into a pile of ash.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Rezmir fails a saving throw while wearing the Black Dragon Mask, she can choose to succeed instead.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.
actions.name: Greatsword (Hazirawn)

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d8) acid damage.
actions.name: Caustic Bolt

actions.description: Rezmir breathes acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Talis is a 9th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Talis has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:
- Cantrips (at will): guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy
- 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds
- 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon (spear)
- 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, mass healing word, sending
- 4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement
- 5th level (1 slot): insect plague

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Talis has +1 scale mail and a wand of winter.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: Talis has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Winter Strike (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, when Talis hits with a melee attack, she can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) cold damage.

actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Spear
